page.title: macOS
page.p: VLC is a popular video player that plays audio as well. It provides limited support for the SAP file format out of the box (no digitized sounds, buggy emulation). For best experience, install the ASAP plugin as follows:
Due to limitations of the VLC plugin interface, the VLC plugin only supports SAP and FC formats.
For command-line conversions (e.g. to WAV or between SAP and the tracker formats) and editing the metadata, install asapconv: open asap--macos.dmg then drag asapconv to bin.
Run the program from the command prompt to see the syntax. The -o/--output option selects the output format and is mandatory.
